scripts.migrate:refresh: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrate: node database/createdb.js && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && node database/grantPrivileges.js
scripts.seed:refresh: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug
